Reviews.Title: Best TV in its size for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jimbo
Reviews.Content: Purchased this model from bestbuy for $399, believe it was on amazon for the same price.Pros:- Absurdly low price- Slim Bezel, generally attractive low key aesthetics- Loud (but standard quality) Speakers- No problems with build or design quality (no dead/stuck pixels, no light leaking, etc.)- Nice deep blacks, great image quality overall- 3 HDMICons (many of these are obvious artifacts of the low price):- Not real 120hz (like almost every TV that claims 120hz), but rather frame interpolation. It is 60hz. No noticable effect on high def files/streaming so far. Although I haven't watched sports on it.- No ethernet or wireless card- Sufficient but limited connections, noticeably missing was optical audio out- Colors cannot manually be adjusted (RGB), there are three color settings, "Normal/Warm/Cool." For the price, I was surprised any of these settings were accurate. The default color setting (normal) was relatively accurate, but the warm setting was functionally perfect. Therefore I ultimately chose the warm setting for color accuracy and then modified the other image settings to turn the highly accurate warn setting into my personal preference of slightly cool coloring (similar to the default scheme you would see on many samsung LCD computer monitors). BOTTOM LINE - More control is always better, but you can get an image with this tv that is highly accuratem, although it takes a bit of doing (also sharpness is absurdly high by default on this thing).For $399 and free shipping, I basically consider this an absurd windfall that I was able to obtain simply due to the previously mediocre reviews of TCL (or its relative obscurity in general in the USA). This is a damn fine TV, and outstrips many many others I have seen in terms of image quality and color accuracy (despite not having manual RGB controls). If this thing goes on sale again, I would jump on it.And hell, its a two year warranty just in case. But you are getting almost 50 inches for $400-500. It's hard to complain.

Reviews.Title: GREAT quality after calibration
Reviews.Author: Simon
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for $400 and out of box the colors were too saturated and picture was too bright. Couldn't change the tint settings and I was really getting annoyed with the reddish hues on faces and skin color. Everything just looked very off and unrealistic. Thankfully I found a solution.I got a tip from another owner to update the TV's firmware(it would allow changing of the tint). It's located on TCL's main website. One thing TCL forgets to mention is to rename the file to "Merge.bin" since it won't accept otherwise.[...]Firmware Update Instructions ‐ 3010 & 3310 modelsPlease follow these instructions to install the firmware update.1) Load the firmware update file "MERGE.bin" onto a USB flash disk.2) Take the USB flash disk and plug it into the USB port on the TV.3) Set TV to standby status, press "Power" key on the TV for 5 seconds, TV will autoupgrade.Note: Standby status is when the TV is off, but the indicator light on the front is lit, to indicate that it isplugged in.After the firmware is updated you can make sure(you don't have to if tint is already changeable) by going to menu - "settings" and look at software info under "Build time". Last time I updated the date was changed to Jun 5 2013.Then you can finally calibrate it to minimize the uneven tones!Brightness: 52Contrast: 53Saturation: 43Sharpness 4 (doesn't really make much a difference, so feel free to play around with)Tint: 46Color Mode: WarmBack Light: 40Dynamic Backlight: OffDynamic Light Sensor: OffNo Overscan (Obviously)These settings do dim the TV a bit but the results are worth it in my opinion. Color reproduction becomes much more accurate. Lastly, the TV cannot compare to more expensive models (usually 2x the price) but at only $400 it cannot be beat.

Reviews.Title: Love these TCL tv's.
Reviews.Author: R. Singer
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality and sound.  Far better than other tv's anywhere near its price point.I also like that it's stripped down without Internet/netflix/etc.  I combine this with a $35 Chromecast and I have a much better Internet interface than any tv with it built-in.

Reviews.Title: More Monitor Then TV
Reviews.Author: D. Federwitz "Dthegiantfed"
Reviews.Content: Pro's: Great Picture for the Price. Easily adjustable picture color and contrast. Plenty of HDMI ports and the TV tuner  works as expected. Simple visual finish would fit into most living spaces.Con's: Slow Control response, changing inputs or even power on or off takes about 1 to .5 seconds for an indication that it received the remote command.A simple TV great price and performance

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a Great price
Reviews.Author: Chris C
Reviews.Content: I was a bit skeptical buying this TV because the brand was unknown to me. But I am glad I did.. The TV is not a PURE 120hz but I did notice it was a lot better with fast moving sports then my 60hz.. Not a big deal.. But what did stand out is the excellent picture quality.. The colors are vivid and bright. The speakers are decent on it as well, no better or worse than my LG unit.Overall I am impressed, I will consider this brand in the future.

Reviews.Title: poor service
Reviews.Author: MD
Reviews.Content: Great TV, customer service is kinda blah, due to the fact that they are not open on the weekend and take forever to do anything.  My TV sarrived with a defective HDMI port board, it took 11 days for parts to arrive and currently I am waiting to schedule a tech to come and install part.  I have had this TV almost a month and I still cant use it.

Reviews.Title: Great tv at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I got this on sale and I am very pleased with my purchase!These were the recommendations for settings I found on another site:Brightness: 52Contrast: 53Saturation: 43Sharpness 4 (doesn't really make much a difference, so feel free to play around with)Tint: 46Color Mode: WarmBack Light: 40Dynamic Backlight: OffDynamic Light Sensor: OffNo Overscan (Obviously)Skin still looks two toned in interview scenes, but it is a lot less noticeable with these settings.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Bugs Bunny
Reviews.Content: A great tv for the price.  Delivery was great.  I was able to set it up without any problems  I would definitely recommend at the $400 and free delivery rate.

Reviews.Title: Great price for a great TV
Reviews.Author: J. Blue
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV when it was on sale for $399.99 and have to say that I'm very impressed. The picture quality is awesome and the overall style of the set is nice. It has a very thin border that helps to cut down on the overall bulk of the set. Not to say that the set is bulky at all. I seriously don't think you can find a better TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great, but not true 120 Hz
Reviews.Author: Sinh Mai "ravingnoodle"
Reviews.Content: The television is fantastic, the picture is great. my only problem with this television is that it isn't true 120 Hz. I've used my dish network receiver as well as my PS3 and it outputs a max of 60 Hz. Overall this is an excellent buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: The price was great the picture was horrible
Reviews.Author: G. Davis
Reviews.Content: The picture looked amazing on menu screens and when hooked up to a computer. When there was any type of animation/movement on the screen, it looked horrible. There was noise around any contrasting colors, sometimes it was boxy and in dark scenes, you could actually see the shading layers. It almost looked like a topographical map on someones face.I did try 3 different HDMI cables, composite and vga from 3 different devices total with no change in the picture quality.Called their tech support # 2 days in a row and got a message saying they were having technical problems.The speakers were impressive for the size. I had this in a small office tho, so not the best place to test.I probably got a bad unit, but didn't feel like trying another round.If it wasn't for the bad display, the only complaint that I have is that when it was wall mounted, it was impossible to plug in component or antenna connections because of the placement, but HDMI was on the side.

Reviews.Title: great picture quality and pretty good speakers
Reviews.Author: emad
Reviews.Content: First, I wasn't sure whether to buy this or a smart tv. I have no regrets regarding going with this. It has a pretty slick look (very thin frame), great picture quality and pretty decent speakers. I have a spare computer attached to it via a hdmi port, which I can control via an ipad to get all the smart features I need.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: Scott Boyington
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up. All functions of this TV work as expected remote control is easier to use than the old TV. Easier to program than my old TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the Price!
Reviews.Author: E Dowllar
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is superb for TV's in this price range. I bought it to replace a dead Panasonic Plasma that was 2 years old. The only minor issue that I would have with it is that the picture tends to wash out or appear more gray about 50 degrees off center. The only other quirk about it is that it takes about 4 seconds to turn on. Not really a big deal but I am rather picky on televisions. I own a high end Samsung LCD which does have a better screen but for the money this TV is a terrific deal. I also bought an extended 5 year warranty available on Amazon for this TV as well.

Reviews.Title: 5 stars
Reviews.Author: malia
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical at first about buying this tv because I was unfamiliar with the brand but the amazing price won me over. It was one of the only tvs I found at 48 inches that had 120hz. This tv is awesome! Easy hookups, great picture, and (as mentioned before) an amazing price. I give it 5 stars and recommend it to anyone!

Reviews.Title: OK Television
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Bourdo
Reviews.Content: The look is good, the picture is good but not the sound it is just OK, Not enough base for me it is really on the high end so not good sound for watching a movie. Sound is important for us so that is wy it wasn't scored so high.

Reviews.Title: Solid TV - bad support from TCL
Reviews.Author: B.B.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV 8 months ago, and it was delivered with white glove service. Its a great 2nd TV, very sharp 1080p. No blurring during fast movement. Looks great with a PS3. What else do you want in a TV?HUGE problem is their support and warranty or lack of both, 6 months later I received a recall/warranty warning via Amazon (way to go Amazon because TCL didn't tell me until I called and confirmed). Called TCL support Jan 21, said they would have a technician to fix it in 2 days. 2 days pass, nothing. Call them again, oh we have let them know it shouldn't be more than 5 days. 15 days later, nothing. Emails and calls to escalate result in nothing. Its now been 45 days and they still don't have a solution. I have asked for the repair manual so I can do the work myself but nothing... (The recall issue is related to 'we left a piece in on a certain number of serial numbers during manufacturing that could cause an electrical shock'. Oh great, electrical shock from my TV, just what I want. Of course shock can also mean fire risk which means I have had this thing unplugged since learning about it.)So I will say its a solid looking TV. But if you ever need TCL to support their own product, even if its their own problem that they admit to and suggest they will fix... Good luck. Not likely to ever buy a TCL in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality, Reasonable Price
Reviews.Author: David Matias
Reviews.Content: One of the best T.V.'s out there for the price! I bought this T.V. for gaming and I am more than happy to discover that it runs the games smoothly. I was having a tough time trying to decide if I wanted a bigger screen size or not but this T.V. was the perfect size for my gaming needs. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: beautiful tv, great price, free shipping, what more do you need?
Reviews.Author: osok
Reviews.Content: I work for my self and when I'm not working I'm a geeky gamer and I like my movies,I'm using this as my computer monitor, tv, home theater movie screen all in one.I love this product!!!The delivery guys where great.  They made sure I had everything I needed and offered to help me install this which I kindly rejected but it was a nice gesture.a part of the bottom mount was broken so I hope this doesn't happen to you.  I have been wanting this for awhile so I didnt go through the process of returning and waiting for a new one.  So I hope this thing doesn't fall over on my face one day, finger crossedWouldn't get a tv of this caliber anywhere else though, I have to be honest, all the features I wanted, cheaper than anywhere else, what more do you want?

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: misticshadow
Reviews.Content: I dont have cable so this is only hooked to my computer. Really good picture quality and for the price of $400 it is a steal. You have to fiddle with the picture setting though.

Reviews.Title: Great tv at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Yinuo liu
Reviews.Content: A great TV for a great price! I got this on sale and I am very pleased with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal
Reviews.Author: Jing
Reviews.Content: We are always looking for a TV, and when the deal came out, we made the decision in a second. The shipping company was really responsible, helping us to deliver it all the way into the room and unpack to check any damages.

Reviews.Title: Rip off
Reviews.Author: Larry A. Burns
Reviews.Content: Tv failed the third time I turned it on, and Amazon has taken 3 weeks and still not picked it up.  False advertisement about 120 Hz.  It is only a 60 Hz.

Reviews.Title: Great value for money!!
Reviews.Author: rachel
Reviews.Content: Got this on the july 4 deal for 399 and the TV was delivered on july 9th. Has 3 HDMI and 1 VGA and 1 USB port. On connecting the laptop to TV using HDMI got max resolution of 1080p at 60hz. Not sure why though.It has good enough sound to fill a living room. Good connectivity options. Decent video, Still not able to figure out the best setting as there is saturation in all preset settings (reddish tinge in a few scenes). Fiddled with the custom settings, guess will get the perfect combination in a couple days. Not many settings to tweak around but a good buy nevertheless, considering the price point.

Reviews.Title: better sound
Reviews.Author: robert gilmette
Reviews.Content: It was a gift they love it.sound could be better that is what I was told,picture ,style is really great.

Reviews.Title: Ok for price
Reviews.Author: Mike Dunlap
Reviews.Content: Doesn't compare to name brands but volume levels are adequate and price was good. At this price point I got what I paid for

Reviews.Title: Excellent Service
Reviews.Author: RageX83
Reviews.Content: Ordered it on July 4th and recevied it on July 8th. The delivery company called the day before it was delivered and told me what time they were planning on coming the next day. The delivery guys called a half an hour before they arrived to let me know they were coming and showed up on time and gave me my TV. The TV looked in perfect condition out of the box and ran very smoothly after some minor picture and sound adjustments. So far I am very pleased with my purchase and the Video looks amazing on the TV.

Reviews.Title: TV I LOVE, BUT HAS AWFUL SMELL
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Sullivan
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THE TV, HOWEVER IT SMELLS !! IT PUTS OUT AN AWFUL SMELL, REALLY BAD WHEN TV IS ON. WHEN OFF, NEED TO BE WITHIN 3' TO SMELL, SO IS INTERNALLY. AM THINKING OF SENDING IT BACK AND HOPEFULLY GET ONE THAT DOESN'T SMELL. DID CALL TCL SUPPORT AND WAS TOLD THAT IF IT WASN'T TECHNICAL MATTER, THEN RETURN IT. SOME HELP THEY WERE.DO LOVE THE SIZE, COLOR IS AMAZING, BUT THE SMELL.... ANY SUGGESTIONS?

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price!
Reviews.Author: ap "allisonp9"
Reviews.Content: A great TV for a great price! This TV is exactly what I was looking for -- nothing "fancy" but just enough to get the job done. It has the inputs that I need (and more!), is nice and slim, and the picture is great. I'd definitely buy a TCL TV again in the future.

Reviews.Title: Still working great after 4 months
Reviews.Author: Brett Carter
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV about 4 months ago.This is my first flat-screen so i don't have much to compare it to, but I have been very pleased with it thus far.It gets used at least 1 hour a day, and probably more than that. And it has never given me any problems.

Reviews.Title: Terrific buy
Reviews.Author: Virginia Hindelly
Reviews.Content: Overall excellent value for the money. Two year warrantee plus one extra from credit card can't be beat . Loved it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Krimsonhookr
Reviews.Content: Beautiful TV for the price! I'd buy a second. Great picture and nice upgrade for my first HDTV. Easy to set up and looks very sleek.

Reviews.Title: It is great!
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: I got it at a good price. So far, the performance is very satisfying. The audio and video are both of high quality.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy from this company
Reviews.Author: William L. Isgette
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv a year ago and the main reason why I purchased was because it was Made in the USA. My husband and I were watching one Sunday night and the tv fell forward out of the stand and hit the edge of our entertainment center. We sent the pictures of the stripped screws and all the information, but they denied the claim even after it says a 2-year warranty. They said it was impossible. Well it's not impossible because it happened. We are older people so there was no partying going on like they inferred. This company does not stand behind their product; so beware. It might be fine at the beginning, but time always tells. The only reason I put in 1 star is because I had to.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: frootloops
Reviews.Content: Nice TV for the price. I wish it could connect to wifi though. I had to pick it up the shipping company bc they deliver 8-5pm, at least they deliver on saturday but I couldn't wait for the tv

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for, better off spending slightly more on something better
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting a lot from this TV for what I paid for it, but let me tell you, if feel short of even that. Blacks are crushed quite a bit, you lose a lot of detail when watching dark movies or TV shows, menu and settings a clunking and picture quality is unimpressive.  I ended up returning it.  I wouldn't recommend buying this TV.  You’re better off spending a few dollars more and getting something of much better quality.  Or just go buy a old brand name used, that picture will still be significantly better than this TV produces.

ProductInfo.Features:
Enhanced picture quality
Plug and play compatibility
Numerous inputs and outputs
USB and MHL Connection For Photo Viewing
Two Year Limited Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: TCL LE55FHDF3310TA 55-Inch 1080p 120Hz LED HDTV (Black)
